page.title: 06SHOPS IN HARROLD CONT'D
page.content:
Shops in Harrold contd. The other shop on the Green is also a general and grocery store.It is a newsagents and a Sub Post Office. Many more people visit this shop on a regular basis<18 out of 2O surveyed> because of the facilities provided.
These two small country shops appear to be very popular and are a focal point for the village. However most people surveyed stated that they did not do their main shopping there, preferring to visit Bedford or Northampton for the supermarkets etc.
Only two people in our survey used the bus service into Bedford, the others preferring to travel there mainly at weekends by car.
